description: This file provides utility functions to extract and format version information from a given data structure 'info'. It defines functions to parse the version into a list of integers and to format it as a string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version from the provided info dictionary, which can be a list or string, and ensures it returns a list of three version components [major, minor, patch]. Defaults to [1, 0, 0] if version info is missing or invalid.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by calling GetVersion and joining the components.
